info.title: Stripe Integration
info.description: Demonstrates how to use Stripe endpoints with an AI agent.

flows.title: Create Customer (POST)
flows.description: Creates a new customer object in Stripe.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The customer's email address.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The customer's full name.

flows.title: List Customers (GET)
flows.description: Retrieves a list of all customers from Stripe.

flows.title: Create Product (POST)
flows.description: Creates a new product object in Stripe.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The product's name, meant to be displayed to the customer.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The product's description, meant to be displayed to the customer.

flows.title: List Products (GET)
flows.description: Retrieves a list of all products from Stripe.

flows.title: Create Price (POST)
flows.description: Creates a new price object in Stripe.

parameters.name: unit_amount
parameters.description: Amount (in cents) to be charged, e.g. 1000 for $10.00.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Product ID to create a price for.

flows.title: List Prices (GET)
flows.description: Retrieves a list of all prices from Stripe.

flows.title: Create Payment Link (POST)
flows.description: Create a payment link object in Stripe.

parameters.name: line_items
parameters.description: A list of line items the customer is purchasing.

flows.title: Create Invoice (POST)
flows.description: Creates a new invoice object in Stripe.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: The ID of the customer who will be billed.

flows.title: Create Invoice Item (POST)
flows.description: Creates an invoice item and adds it to an existing invoice.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: The ID of the customer who will be billed.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The integer amount in cents of the charge to be applied.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.

flows.title: Finalize Invoice (POST)
flows.description: Finalize the specified draft invoice.

parameters.name: invoice
parameters.description: ID of the invoice you want to finalize.

flows.title: Retrieve Balance (GET)
flows.description: Retrieves the current account balance for your Stripe account.

flows.title: Create Refund (POST)
flows.description: Creates a new refund for a previously created charge.

parameters.name: charge
parameters.description: Charge ID to refund.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: A positive integer in cents representing how much to refund.

flows.title: Update Product (POST)
flows.description: Updates the specific Stripe product by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product to update.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the product.

flows.title: Retrieve Product by ID (GET)
flows.description: Retrieves the Stripe product object by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the product to retrieve.

flows.title: Create Checkout Session (POST)
flows.description: Create a new checkout session in Stripe.

parameters.name: line_items
parameters.description: A list of items the customer is buying.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode of the Checkout Session (payment, subscription, or setup).

parameters.name: success_url
parameters.description: URL to which Stripe should redirect when payment completes.

parameters.name: cancel_url
parameters.description: URL to which Stripe should redirect when payment is canceled.

flows.title: Create Billing Portal Session (POST)
flows.description: Creates a session of the customer portal.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: ID of an existing customer.

parameters.name: return_url
parameters.description: The URL to which the customer will be redirected when they exit the portal.

flows.title: Retrieve Price by ID (GET)
flows.description: Retrieves a specific price object by ID.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The ID of the price to retrieve.

flows.title: Update Price (POST)
flows.description: Updates the specified price object by ID.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The ID of the price to update.

parameters.name: nickname
parameters.description: A brief nickname for the price for the customer's convenience.

flows.title: Search Customers (GET)
flows.description: Search for customers using the provided query string.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query string, e.g. email:'test@example.com'.

flows.title: Retrieve Customer by ID (GET)
flows.description: Retrieves the Stripe customer object by customer ID.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to retrieve.

flows.title: List Billing Portal Configurations (GET)
flows.description: Retrieves a list of all billing portal configurations.

flows.title: Create Billing Portal Configuration (POST)
flows.description: Creates a new configuration that defines the functionality of the customer portal.

parameters.name: business_profile
parameters.description: Information about the business for the portal configuration.

flows.title: Create Product and Price
flows.description: Use this flow when you need to create both a product and its associated price in one operation. The flow will first create the product, then automatically use the new product's ID to create a price for it.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the product's name that will be shown to customers. Example: 'Premium Subscription' or 'Basic Plan'.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Optionally provide additional details about the product. Example: 'Monthly subscription with unlimited access'.

parameters.name: unit_amount
parameters.description: Specify the price in cents (smallest currency unit). For example, use 1000 for $10.00 USD, or 2500 for Â£25.00 GBP.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Specify the three-letter ISO currency code in lowercase. Examples: 'usd', 'eur', 'gbp', 'jpy'.
